mapper.select: SELECT ec.title, ec.cover, ec.lesson_num, ec.price, es1.title AS subject_level_one, es2.title AS subject_level_two, et.`name` AS teacher_name FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id = es2.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId}
